ranking.description: Claude Code superpowers: core skills library
ranking.description_ja: Claude Code superpowers: core skills library
ranking.readme_summary: Superpowers Superpowers is a complete software development workflow for your coding agents, built on top of a set of composable "skills" and some initial instructions that make sure your agent uses them. How it works It starts from the moment you fire up your coding agent. As soon as it sees that you're building something, it *doesn't* just jump into trying to write code
ranking.readme_summary_ja: Superpowers Superpowers is a complete software development workflow for your coding agents, built on top of a set of composable "skills" and some initial instructions that make sure your agent uses them. How it works It starts from the moment you fire up your coding agent. As soon as it sees that you're building something, it *doesn't* just jump into trying to write code

ranking.readme_summary: Twitter Emoji (Twemoji) ![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/twitter/twemoji) A simple library that provides standard Unicode emoji support across all platforms. **Twemoji v14.0** adheres to the Unicode 14.0 spec and supports the Emoji 14.0 spec. _We do not support custom emoji._ The Twemoji library offers support for all Unicode-defined emoji which are recommended for general interchange (RGI)
ranking.readme_summary_ja: Twitter Emoji (Twemoji) ![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/twitter/twemoji) A simple library that provides standard Unicode emoji support across all platforms. **Twemoji v14.0** adheres to the Unicode 14.0 spec and supports the Emoji 14.0 spec. _We do not support custom emoji._ The Twemoji library offers support for all Unicode-defined emoji which are recommended for general interchange (RGI)

ranking.description: Claude Code is an agentic coding tool that lives in your terminal, understands your codebase, and helps you code faster by executing routine tasks, explaining complex code, and handling git workflows - all through natural language commands.

ranking.readme_summary: AI Agents A-Z In this repo, you can find the n8n templates we created for the episodes of AI Agents A-Z. Season 1 - Episode 1: Creating a prescription agent - Episode 2: Making a daily digest agent - Episode 3: Making LinkedIn posts using Human in the Loop approval process - Episode 4: Deep Research Agent using Google - Episode 5: Creating a blog writing system using deep research - Episode 6: Lead generation with X-Ray search and LinkedIn - Episode 7: Creating Youtube short videos using our cus...
